thread.title: D3 - Bob Sapp UFC Battle for Doom 3

post.author: Brain Trepaning
post.body:
This mod is a simulator intended to best create the experience of being locked into the world famous
UFC octagon to square off in battle against 356 pound one-time NFL linebacker Bob "The Beast" Sapp.

Click HERE to get it!

post.author: Brain Trepaning
post.body:
For those wanting a screenshot (thanks to The Happy Friar for the beauty shot)



The mod was made to commemorate and simulate Bob Sapp's
USA debut February 23rd 2008 against super-heavyweight Jan Nortje.
The video at the start of the mod is from February 22nd.

btw: the face in the screenshot and poster is the same picture, but the poster version has been photochopped.

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body:
I was trying to get a shot of both of us punching. I had another nice shot too:

Attachment:
shot00005.jpg [99.28 KB]
Downloaded 82 times

post.author: Brain Trepaning
post.body:
Good punch, you totally flattened his nose!

Try to get a shot of him when he's down.

post.author: MBolus
post.body: Cool, but can you make a game with newborn twins?

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body:
Brain Trepaning wrote:
Try to get a shot of him when he's down.


man, he's got a set of knockers on him!

Attachment:
shot00008.jpg [76.55 KB]
Downloaded 72 times

post.author: Brain Trepaning
post.body:
MBolus: I could make a game with newborn twins, yes, but it would help if they had previous experience with the level editor.

The Happy Friar: It kind of makes sense that such a big pussy would have huge knockers, but I was actually thinking about a shot of the face when he's down. Still, nice screenie!

post.author: Brain Trepaning
post.body: If you would like to check out a preview of the "Bob Sapp UFC Battle" Doom 3 mod, you can see it HERE on YouTube!

post.author: 6th Venom
post.body:
Mmmh, i'm sure searching on the board i could found myself saying "you're crazy" one year ago!

You always come from nowhere with unbelievable mods! Happy to know you're still around D3W.

post.author: MBolus
post.body:
The Happy Friar wrote:
Attachment:
shot00008.jpg
Looks like that picture of Anna Nicole with a tan.

post.author: ajm113
post.body: LOL Giant Mellons. Hey it's great seeing new mods again from you. I thought you left Doom3 Modding.

post.author: LinuxDoomer
post.body: No thanks. I'm a DIE-HARD BOXING fan and would rather see UFC die. Yes, I'm being VERY SERIOUS too.
